name: postcss-calc

scripts.test: npm run jscs && npm run jshint && tape test | tap-colorize
npm run jscs && npm run jshint && tape test | tap-colorize
npm run jscs && npm run jshint && tape test | tap-colorize

scripts.build: del-cli dist && cross-env BABEL_ENV=publish babel src --out-dir dist

del-cli dist && cross-env BABEL_ENV=publish babel src --out-dir dist
